snippet: The Royals’ Alex Gordon proved a quick study for Familia’s quick pitch, and the Mets were undone in the World Series opener.
lead_paragraph: The Royals’ Alex Gordon proved a quick study for Familia’s quick pitch, and the Mets were undone in the World Series opener.

headline.print_headline: After Tricky Pitch Quickly Backfires, Mets’ Familia Receives Support From Collins
headline.main: Mets’ Jeurys Familia Receives Support From Manager After Tricky Pitch Quickly Backfires
